faqs.answer: SlimeVR does not take long to setup and you only need to do it once. You can find a guide for the setup here: https://docs.slimevr.dev/server-setup/slimevr-setup.html.

faqs.answer: The trackers are estimated to ship on April 28th, 2023. You can check for updates in the [#updates](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/818062236492759050) and [#production-progress](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/1025118385585004544) channels on the Discord or on the CrowdSupply page at https://www.crowdsupply.com/slimevr/slimevr-full-body-tracker.

faqs.answer: It's not recommended to use 3 trackers. If you use 3 trackers, you won't be able to bend your legs (commonly referred to as "Minecraft" legs). Check here for more information: https://docs.slimevr.dev/slimevr101.html#how-many-trackers-do-you-need.
matched_questions: can I use 3 trackers for full body tracking

faqs.answer: Here's information about how many trackers you need: https://docs.slimevr.dev/slimevr101.html#how-many-trackers-do-you-need.

faqs.answer: **__Don't__** buy trackers from Amazon. Buying trackers from Amazon is not recommended as there have been many reports of faulty trackers from Amazon. You can check in the [#amazon-trackers](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/986713204656857138) channel on the SlimeVR Discord for more information.
matched_questions: are the amazon trackers ok to buy?
should I buy trackers from amazon or will they suck?

faqs.answer: You likely have unofficial trackers from Amazon, it's recommended that you just return them. Otherwise, if you really want to try to make them work, you can check in the [#amazon-trackers](https://discord.com/channels/817184208525983775/986713204656857138) channel on the SlimeVR Discord for more information.

faqs.answer:
# Bingus Search
Hi! Welcome to Bingus Search. This is a tool for searching SlimeVR FAQ questions using AI.
## How do I search?
To search using this tool, just type in a question in the text box (like you did to see this) and the results will show up below.

It's possible that you don't have the required WebView2 installed. You can download the WebView2 installer from here, make sure to specifically run it as an administrator otherwise it may not work: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/webview2/consumer/.
